creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Tales of Ise in Fashionable Brocade Prints (Fūryū nishiki-e Ise monogatari 風流錦絵伊勢物語)
text: Number 24 in the series, which follows the iroha-system.
title: The Syllable U: A Gift of an Artifical Plum Branch and Pheasant
